snippet: Tapes played at the federal terrorism trial of Mohamed Osman Mohamud, accused of plotting to bomb a crowded square in Portland, Ore., showed a sometimes swaggering religious militant.
abstract: FBI video and audio tapes played in federal terrorism trial of Somali-American Mohamed Osman Mohamud portray him as bombastic youth who repeatedly said he was willing to kill and die as a martyr; Mohamud, arrested in sting operation, is accused of attempting to detonate bomb in Portland, Ore.
lead_paragraph: Tapes played at the federal terrorism trial of Mohamed Osman Mohamud, accused of plotting to bomb a crowded square in Portland, Ore., showed a sometimes swaggering religious militant.

headline.seo: Tapes Reveal Different Side of Portland Bombing Suspect
headline.main: Harsher View of Bombing Suspect Is Revealed on Tapes
headline.print_headline: Harsher View of Bombing Suspect Is Revealed on Tapes
